00039 #include "MersenneTwister.h"
00040 
00041 unsigned long MersenneTwister::RandomUInt()
00042 {
00043         return RandomInteger();
00044 }
00045 
00046 void MersenneTwister::GenerateNewState()
00047 {
00048   for ( int i = 0; i < ( N - M ); ++i ) m_state[i] = m_state[i + M] ^ Twiddle( m_state[i], m_state[i + 1] );
00049   for ( int i = N - M; i < (N - 1); ++i ) m_state[i] = m_state[i + M - N] ^ Twiddle( m_state[i], m_state[i + 1] );
00050   m_state[N - 1] = m_state[ M - 1 ] ^ Twiddle( m_state[N - 1], m_state[0] );
00051   m_p = 0; // reset position
00052 }
00053 
00054 void MersenneTwister::Seed( unsigned long seedValue )
00055 {
00056     m_state[0] = seedValue & 0xFFFFFFFFUL; // for > 32 bit machines
00057     for ( int i = 1; i < N; ++i )
00058     {
00059         m_state[i] = 1812433253UL * ( m_state[i - 1] ^ ( m_state[i - 1] >> 30 ) ) + i;
00060         m_state[i] &= 0xFFFFFFFFUL; // for > 32 bit machines
00061   }
00062   m_p = N; // force GenerateNewState() to be called for next random number
00063 }
00064 
00065 void MersenneTwister::Seed( const unsigned long* seedArray, int arraySize )
00066 {
00067     Seed( 19650218UL );
00068     int i = 1;
00069     int j = 0;
00070     for ( int k = ( ( N > arraySize ) ? N : arraySize ); k; --k )
00071     {
00072         m_state[i] = ( m_state[i] ^ ( ( m_state[i - 1] ^ ( m_state[i - 1] >> 30 ) ) * 1664525UL ) ) 
00073                      + seedArray[j] + j; // non linear
00074         m_state[i] &= 0xFFFFFFFFUL; // for > 32 bit machines
00075         ++j; j %= arraySize;
00076         if ( ( ++i ) == N ) 
00077         { 
00078             m_state[0] = m_state[N - 1];
00079             i = 1;
00080         }
00081     }
00082     for ( int k = N - 1; k; --k )
00083     {
00084         m_state[i] = ( m_state[i] ^ ( ( m_state[i - 1] ^ ( m_state[i - 1] >> 30 ) ) * 1566083941UL ) ) - i;
00085         m_state[i] &= 0xFFFFFFFFUL; // for > 32 bit machines
00086         if ( (++i) == N ) 
00087         { 
00088             m_state[0] = m_state[N - 1];
00089             i = 1;
00090         }
00091     }
00092     m_state[0] = 0x80000000UL; // MSB is 1; assuring non-zero initial array
00093     m_p = N; // force GenerateNewState() to be called for next random number
00094 }
